channel.title: How do i make my own private server?
channel.description: how do u make a private server because i want to make one just like some other private servers and make some twsts to it you can ethier reply to me or e-mail me at tommom1@verizon.net and if you do e-mail e-mail me links to sites where you can start making your on private server or if you reply just add a link to the webstite to strat private server i might be in wrong section if i still answer plzzzzz.

item.title: How do i make my own private server?
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

striker911:

i have been on the server status but how do i play those private servers plzzzzzzzzz tell me how and what websites there on

You’ve put urself into too much confusion, my friend.
It’s really not that hard, Just download the latest version of moparscape, download all of the Java requirements, run moparscape, add in an IP that is online like you saw in the server status page (good job), choose any username and any password you’d like, and click “Log in”, and if it logs you in, you’ve done it perfectly. If it says error connecting to server, then the server is down. Choose a different server. And voila my friend.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my own private server?
